thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 10 of 3524
thread.title: Nikki

author: Nikki
title: Nikki
text: I love buying books, but can't always find what I'm looking for at local bookstores. I'm working on my collection of Dean Koontz novels and Thriftbooks had plenty that I hadn't been able to find elsewhere. All of the books were in the condition they were described in, and I have no problem buying used books. The fact that I only had to spend $10 to get free shipping blew my mind. My books arrived in several different shipments, but the time it took to get them was worth not having to pay outrageous shipping prices. I will definitely be buying from them again in the future!
